summary: With this console commands you can adopt children like: Babette, Fjotra, Haming etc...
descriptionHtml:
The Hearthfire DLC disappointed me about that you can\'t adopt awesome children like Babette. So I find these console commands that you can use by:

1-Opening the console.
2-Click on the children you would like to adopt.
3-Enter this console command: setfactionrank 03004290 1
4-Finish.

You need Hearthfire of course and Hearthfire multiple adoptions - Now with custom home support for kids and spouse by TMPhoenix.

Special Thanks:
 
Bethesda
TMPhoenix

ALL THANKS TO TMPHOENIX!
author: BuDDy
